casebody.data:
Mary E. ROPER
v.
The CITY OF BATON ROUGE/PARISH OF EAST BATON ROUGE and Casey Cashio, in his official capacity as Council Administrator-Treasurer for the City of Baton Rouge/Parish of East Baton Rouge, et al. and All Consolidated Cases NO. 2018-C-0854 Supreme Court of Louisiana. September 28, 2018 Denied. HUGHES, J., would grant in part.
